Title: Prohibits food products containing brominated vegetable oil, potassium bromate, propylparaben, red dye 3, and titanium dioxide
Summary: Prohibits food products containing brominated vegetable oil, potassium bromate, propylparaben, red dye 3, and titanium dioxide; provides for a private right of action for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting certain food additives and food color additives, and providing for a private right of action
